title: Social Share Email Block
body:
Social Share Email Block¶

The Social Share block allows you to add customizable links that allow the email recipient to share the email to others via a number of options - FaceBook, forwarding the email to a friend, LinkedIn, Pinterest, or Twitter.
To use this block, you will need to have navigated to the email design tab. Click here if you are having trouble reaching this point.

  1. Place a Social Share block in your email where desired

  2. By default, FaceBook, Twitter, and an option to forward the email to a friend will be linked

  • You also have the option to provide a link to share the email on LinkedIn and Pinterest

  1. Click :icon:`plus` Add Service and select a social media platform to add an additional link to your block

  2. Click the to delete a link

  3. If desired, change the properties of the social share links in the Style tab

  4. If desired, change the properties of the icons in the Settings tab

  5. Click Done
